description: Replacement parts for CC130J aircraft for the Department of National Defence Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 4.
full_summary:
### Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC130J Hercules

**Bid Reference:** cb-935-60451476
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-248018/A
**Publication Date:** 2023-12-21
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-05T14:00:00

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking qualified suppliers for the acquisition of Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC130J Hercules aircraft. This procurement is open to qualified suppliers under the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.

**Scope of Work:**

The DND is seeking to acquire one (1) item for the CC130J Aircraft, as part of the Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 4's requirements.

**Invited Suppliers:**

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Aero Technical Components Inc.
* JHT Defense Inc.
* Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.
* Simex Defence Inc.
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* Unisource Technology Inc.
* CASP
* Bristow Instruments (1977) Ltd.
* AllClear Aerospace and Defence Inc.

**Proposal Submission:**

Proposal documents will be e-mailed directly by the Contracting Officer to the qualified suppliers invited to bid on this requirement. Suppliers are advised that the Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the proposal documents.

**Contact Information:**

For inquiries regarding this proposal, please contact the Contracting Authority:

* Name: Kuangyun Xu
* Email: Kuangyun.Xu@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-939-6082

**Notice Type:**

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement.

**Procurement Category:**

This procurement falls under the Goods and Services code (GD).

**Selection Criteria:**

The selection of suppliers will be based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**

This procurement is open to suppliers based in the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Regions of Delivery:**

Goods will be delivered to Ontario (except NCR).

**Contracting Entity:**

* Name: Department of National Defence
* Address: 455 Boul de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC J8Y 6V7

[Insert URL]
